text: [Jinzhi nimen qu de hai you]: You fu zhi fu, dan nimen suo yongyou de nunu nu fu chuwai. An la ruci wei nimen zhiding faling. Chu ci zhi wai, suoyou funu dui nimen dou shi hefa de, nimen dang yong nimen de caiwu [pinjin] lai xunqiu yu tamen jiehun, dan ying baochi zhencao, buke yindang. Suoyi, nimen ji yi tong tamen xiangshou kuaile, nimen jiu ying song gei tamen pinjin zuo jueding. Zai pinjin queding hou, fan nimen bici tongyi zuo de shi [duo gei pinjin], dui nimen shi wu zui de. An la que shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.
